OH.content: Valéry: Mediterranean has been a veritable machine for making culture
Valéry predicts media war & says everything fiduciary requires conventions (relays, intermediary) that destroys rudimentary life
for Valéry, logos: calculation, reason, speech, discourse, knowledge > history

BSi.content: for Valéry, Poe higher than anyone/anything else
Derrida points out decreasing statistical series in Valéry: seen many…visited few…played my part
